title: Signs of approaching recovery from magic in a dream

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, signs of approaching recovery from magic in a dream. With the variety of symbols and good meanings that they carry with them, many dream interpreters have reported that there is a group of symbols that indicate the release of the dreamer’s restlessness and the removal of the spell that has possessed him, especially when one wakes up from stability, joy from Seeing him, wanting to know the interpretation that he brings, and God wrote the conclusion of his suffering from magic and the evil that it brings upon him, in those messages or dreams that he sees, and this we explain in our article according to what scholars have indicated through him. Encyclopedia, so follow us. Signs of almost being cured of witchcraft in a dreamOne of the most important signs of almost being cured of witchcraft in a dream, we take into account through the following lines: Magic was mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in Surah Al-Baqarah, verse 102, with the words of God Almighty: “And the disbelief of Solomon and the disbelief of the devils Teaching men magic.” Because the master of magic and his student will not please them because of the harm it causes to creation, and God Almighty has forbidden us. Seeing the killing of a snake or a cat in the dreamer’s dream indicates the approaching date of his release from captivity and the magic that it entails. It is one of the most wonderful visions, and God knows best. To see the sea in a dream symbolizes for the dreamer: a quick recovery from witchcraft in reality, and God knows the unseen. Seeing bathing with cold water in the dream of the dreamer, that is, the person who has fallen into witchcraft, means that he will be healed, God willing. He must read the Qur’an and Ayat al-Kursi and listen a lot to the legal ruqyah until he is healed by the command of God, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. It symbolizes seeing blood flowing from the body of an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman in a dream. Magic is healing in reality, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing blood, water, or any substance coming out of the body in a dream of a bewitched person explains this; In fact, God writes for the monarch a quick recovery from magic and getting rid of its effects. There are many symbols that bring good news of getting rid of magic and untangling it, and among the most important of these symbols are the following. Black Seed God knows best. Signs of weakness in a dream. Seeing climbing a mountain in a dreamer’s dream explains this; God frees the dreamer from magic by God’s command, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. To see yourself running away from someone in a dream and to be successful in it means. Healing from magic, as it is one of the signs of keeping magic away from the bewitched in a dream, and God is All-Powerful and Able to do all things. To see yourself drinking Zamzam water in a dream means that your date of recovery is approaching by God’s command, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, seeing yourself washing with water, specifically Zamzam water from Promising dreams that indicate goodness and happiness that befall the dreamer in reality, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. To see light in the dreamer’s dream means: the dreamer’s recovery from witchcraft, because light in a dream is one of the signs of imminent recovery from witchcraft in a dream. One of the most important signs of recovery from witchcraft in Dreaming of reciting the Holy Qur’an, because its verses heal, God willing, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing or reciting the verses of Surat Al-Kursi in the Holy Qur’an indicates that God is writing by His command to heal the sick person from evil and remove magic from him, and

title: What is the interpretation of seeing water in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Drinking water in a dream, drinking Zamzam water in a dream, and drinking cold water in a dream

preview.html: Water in a dream. Interpreters believe that the vision portends good news and conveys good news to the dreamer, but it portends evil in some cases. Water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Water in a dream. The interpretation of water in a dream indicates the disappearance of distress and getting rid of the problems that worry the dreamer and spoil his happiness. As for seeing foamy water, it means Illegal money harms its owner and does not benefit him. If the dreamer sees a person’s reflection in water, this indicates his kindness to his family and his good morals. As for throwing water on clothes in the vision, it leads to his failure to achieve his goals or injustice from someone. In his life. River water is considered a harbinger of bad luck because it indicates crises and misfortunes, but rainwater in a dream symbolizes comfort, happiness, blessings, sustenance, mercy, and forgiveness from God, and water in a dream in general. It indicates a high position and a high position in society. Water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that water in a dream symbolizes the fulfillment of desires and the dreamer’s access to everything he wants in life. It is the end of sorrows and worries, and portends abundant food and blessings in money. ) in everything he does. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of senior dream and vision translators in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Water in a dream for a single woman. The vision promises the dreamer that her husband will approach a handsome young man with good morals, fall in love with him at first sight and make her happy and live with him the most beautiful days of her life. It expresses her sense of stability due to her success in her work and shows her feeling With passion, enthusiasm, and love of life, and her constant insistence on excellence, progress, and change for the better. Seeing running water in a single woman’s dream indicates that the visionary is a sincere person who deals with people honestly and clearly and does not pretend. It also indicates her good morals and her tender feelings and compassion because she helps the poor and sympathizes with the needy. The dream urges her to Stick to it. They have good qualities and do not allow life’s difficulties to change them. Walking on water in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman doubts someone in her life, the dream foretells that she will cut off doubt with certainty about the matter she doubts, and soon it will calm down in her mind. If the dreamer feels fear From something or someone and she has a lot of negative thoughts that worry her, the dream carries a message telling her to calm down because the Lord (the Almighty) will protect her from what she fears. The dream of pouring water on the ground in a dream for an unmarried woman is an indication of the strength of the visionary faith and that she is seeking to gain God’s satisfaction ( The Most High) and she approaches him by doing good and staying away from everything that angers him, and the vision shows that she is loved by her. Friends and acquaintances because of respect, lightness of speech, and good judgment. Water in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of water in a dream for a married woman is that she will soon get what she wants and longs for and pray to God Almighty for a long time. The dream indicates that she will soon hear happy news and her life will change for the better once she hears it, But seeing herself walking on water means that she will be sad

title: The 8 most important interpretations of seeing a merchant in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a merchant in a dream? It indicates a journey to make money. Interpretation of seeing a merchant going bankrupt in a dream? Proof of the losses that the fortuneteller falls into. What is the interpretation of seeing that he is traveling with the merchant? Evidence of her marriage to someone who is not from her country. What does it mean to see a married woman You give money to a merchant? Evidence of the goodness that you will obtain. What is the interpretation of seeing a merchant in a pregnant woman’s dream? Evidence of the goodness and blessing that she obtains. Interpretation of a merchant’s dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a merchant in a dream is a sign that you will earn money and get a lot of living, and this is what Ibn Sirin explained. Sirin. Next, seeing a merchant in a dream may mean that you are traveling to earn money. When you see a merchant in a dream, this is evidence of the wisdom of the fortuneteller. Seeing a dream about a merchant Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi confirmed that seeing a merchant in a dream could be evidence of profits and earning a lot of money. If If a person dreams that he is traveling with a merchant in a dream, this indicates that he is traveling to fulfill his dreams. A merchant in a dream shows a wise man who preaches to people. Then whoever sees in his dream that he has become a merchant, this is evidence that he does a lot of good and helps people. Seeing bankruptcy may indicate A merchant in a dream indicates the losses that the dreamer will suffer. Interpretation of a dream about a merchant for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a merchant, this is a sign of good luck. Then the merchant’s view of the individual may indicate his superiority in work and his acquisition of an important position. If a girl sees in her dream that she is working With a merchant, it means that she will get married soon and will become rich. Then if she sees in a dream that she is traveling with a merchant, this is evidence of her marriage to someone who is not from her country. Seeing a dream about a merchant for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is a merchant, this indicates a positive change In her life it will happen soon. Seeing a merchant in a dream for a married woman is an indication of the success and superiority that she will enjoy. If a married woman sees that she is giving money to a merchant, this indicates the goodness that she will receive. Seeing a married woman, a merchant, in a dream, talking to her husband , is an indication of large-scale feeding. If a married woman sees in a dream a merchant borrowing money from her, then this vision was not good. Interpretation of a dream about a merchant for a pregnant woman. A merchant in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of goodness and blessings that she will receive. Seeing an attractive-looking merchant in a dream For a pregnant woman, it is a sign of the collapse of the problems and troubles she is going through. Seeing a smiling merchant in a dream can mean for a pregnant woman an easy and trouble-free birth and she will give birth to a healthy baby.

title: Interpretation of a dream about praying for someone who wronged me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of praying for someone who wronged me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of praying for someone who wronged me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of praying for someone who wronged me in a dream could be an indication of good things, and God knows the unseen. But if a young man sees a prayer for someone who wronged him, it may lead to salvation from distress, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The same applies if she sees a prayer for someone who wronged me. A divorced woman praying for someone who wronged her, as this may indicate relief from stress, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl praying for someone who wronged her, this may mean that the prayer has been answered, and God knows the unseen. While praying for evil against the one who wronged me could be an indication of bad situations, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my enemy watching me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my enemy watching me in a dream. Someone watching you can indicate wrong words about the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees someone watching him while he holds a position, it may express danger or loss of the status of the dreamer, and God knows best. If the young man sees someone watching him This may be a sign of gossip and sins on the part of some people, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a single girl sees someone watching her, it may be a sign that she is trying to reveal secrets, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my enemy helps me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my enemy helps me in a dream. Seeing the enemy can To represent good things, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the enemy, this may indicate goodness and happiness, God willing. If a married man sees an enemy threatening him with good, this may indicate no good, and God knows the unseen. If seeing the enemy threatening evil may indicate good, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my enemy being caught. My hand in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my enemy holding me with his hand in a dream. Seeing someone forcefully holding my hand can express his authority over something that does not satisfy you, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees someone holding her hand, this indicates marriage, and God Almighty knows. When an unmarried girl sees Whoever holds her hand by force, this indicates his coercion into things that she does not approve of, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about someone laughing at you in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone laughing at you in a dream could indicate the arrogance and cruelty that she faced, and God knows the unseen. As he may express his arrogance, but he acquires cruelty. In his life, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees someone laughing at her, this indicates arrogance, and God knows best. Also, the dreamer’s vision can be expressed by laughing at him, which may indicate that he does not see the reality of things and he must pray to God to illuminate his path, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream The enemy is threatening me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an enemy threatening me in a dream could be a reference to fear and cowardice, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When he sees a young man being threatened by the enemy, his fear appears, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the enemy threatening her, this may be a sign of her fear, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a sick enemy in a dream. Interpretation Dreaming of a sick enemy in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see this. However, seeing someone I know who is actually sick could be a sign of hypocrisy and lies, as he can express his hypocrisy and lies, and God is more than good.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a calm, clear sea alone

preview.html: This person has high morals, is loved by people, and has a large family known for his beautiful qualities. We will explain more explanations to you through an interpreter’s website, so please follow us. Interpretation of seeing a calm and clear sea for a single woman: If a girl sees in her dream a beautiful colored sea. This dream indicates that this The girl loves competition and does things that can lead to severe problems. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees in her dream a gray sea with high waves. This vision indicates the presence of worries, problems, sorrows and difficult circumstances facing you. She could not get rid of these circumstances easily and this will affect her life. When An unmarried girl sees a beautiful and calm sea in her dream. This dream indicates that she will fulfill many desires, and perhaps find a new job. It is possible to renew this job for long periods of time. Also, when an unmarried girl sees a blue sea in her dream, and she likes to see it. This vision indicates that this girl will change her life for the better and will be filled with joy and happiness in the coming days. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the sea with a beautiful color, and this sea is wide, and she looks at it with a balcony. This dream shows that this girl has many things that she is trying to do for Achieving this. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a calm and serenity sea in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a beautiful and calm sea in her dream. This indicates that she will soon learn of the news of her pregnancy and give birth to a male child, God willing. But if the pregnant woman sees In her dream there is a beautiful and calm sea, she enjoys looking at it. This dream indicates that this woman will enjoy joy and happiness. And that she will love and obey her husband, and perform her domestic duties to the fullest extent. When a married woman sees in her dream a blue sea, and this sea was clean. This appears The vision is that she did things that did not please God, and that she neglected her husband and her home, but she repented and changed for the better. Whereas if a married woman sees a deep blue sea in her dream, that woman also drinks from it. This indicates that this woman is virtuous, loves kindness to people, and her features Beautiful and loved by the family. When a married woman sees the sea in her dream, its color is blue, but she is unhappy. This dream indicates that this woman suffers from many problems and worries in her married life and her husband’s misbehavior towards her, and this may lead to divorce between them. If she sees A married woman sees a beautifully colored sea in her dream. It indicates the happiness she lives in her home, respect between her and her husband, and understanding. Interpretation of seeing a calm sea in a dream for a man and its meaningIf one sees in his dream a clear sea, but that person was unhappy seeing the sea. This indicates The dream indicates that this man faces many worries in his life. Difficult financial circumstances and many debts, but he will soon get rid of them. Whereas if the man sees in his dream the sea blue, clear and beautiful. This indicates that he will reach a prestigious position. Perhaps he will have a new job in his work and gain respect. And high status

Interpretation of seeing a calm sea in a dream for a man and its meaningIf one sees in his dream a clear sea, but that person was unhappy seeing the sea. This indicates The dream indicates that this man faces many worries in his life. Difficult financial circumstances and many debts, but he will soon get rid of them. Whereas if the man sees in his dream the sea blue, clear and beautiful. This indicates that he will reach a prestigious position. Perhaps he will have a new job in his work and gain respect. And high status

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a tower in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a tower in a dream, signs of good and evil in a dream, and knowing the interpretation of a tower in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women. The tower is a huge, tall building with its own design, the most famous of which are the Eiffel Tower and the Burj Khalifa. The past period with the rise of escalators and we see them everywhere in our reality, but many people dream of towers, but they did not find the correct interpretation for them, and we will explain them to you correctly according to the best jurists and scholars. Interpretation of the dream of Ibn Sirin's tower: Interpretation of seeing a tower or tall buildings in a dream, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, indicates cunning, deception and conspiracy. Seeing a sick person from a constellation in a dream means not recovering from illness and possibly death. The dream of seeing a rising tower in a dream indicates the dreamer's ambitions and the pursuit of what he wants. The interpretation of the dream of standing on the roof of a tower in a dream indicates that the owner of the dream has a strong personality and is able to make the right decisions. Standing in a tall building or an uninhabited tower in a dream is a sign of separation and death. Seeing someone entering the tower in a dream is a desirable vision, indicating success and achieving goals. Interpretation of the dream of a tower for a single woman: Seeing the tower of towers rising in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she will achieve what she wants and aspires to in life. The dream of towers in a girl's dream is generally desirable because it is a good thing and evidence of her good fortune. Interpretation of the unmarried girl The one who sees herself climbing the tower in an elevator in her dream is evidence of her marriage to a good man who is distinguished by his morals and status. A beautiful view from the top of the tower in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates soon good and happy news for her. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman's tower: Seeing the zodiac in a married woman's dream is a good vision that bodes well for her and her entire family. Interpretation of a dream about life in the zodiac with a dream for a married woman, as this indicates a change in her life for the better in terms of material and family. The dream of beautiful towers in a married woman's dream is evidence of achieving her dreams and a better future. Seeing a leaning tower in a married woman's dream is a sign of bad luck and a lot of conflict and trouble within her family. Interpretation of a dream of a tower for a pregnant woman: The interpretation of a dream of the rising of the zodiac in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that it will make her pregnancy period good and her imminent birth. The leaning tower in a pregnant woman's dream does not bode well and indicates the danger that she and her fetus may be exposed to. Seeing the zodiac falling in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of the ease of her birth and the safety and security of her unborn child. Interpretation of dreams of the fall and collapse of the tower: Interpretation of seeing The collapse of towers in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is committing many mistakes and sins. Dreaming of a tower falling in a dream is evidence of abandoning work, failing in studies, loss, and loss of money. The collapse of a famous tower in the dreamer’s city in a dream indicates the emergence of strife and injustice in that city and perhaps an upcoming war.

title: Interpretation of the radio in a dream and listening to the radio in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about the radio for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced women, whether the new recorder, the large tape, listening to music or Qur’anic songs by Ibn Sirin, and more. Interpretation of the radio in a dream: At different times of the day, we may tend to listen to the radio to find out the most important news that is happening in our society or around the world. Through various programs, the radio is one of the means that allows us to listen to the most beautiful songs and songs that we love. Listening to the radio in a dream generally indicates kindness and that the person will experience a period of happiness and joy that will gather in his heart. It also means reassurance and peace of mind in various fields. The dream may mean By listening to the radio, news spreads quickly and reaches a large number of people. On the other hand, this dream may indicate that you hear good news that brings happiness to ordinary life. Hearing soft music and songs with a beautiful and sweet voice on the radio in a dream is a sign of good deeds. But if you find that the radio has been turned off in the dream, it means that You can help solve problems affecting someone around you or solve a social problem, but you refuse to provide this help in reality. Interpretation of the radio in one dream: For an unmarried woman, if she listens to the radio in a dream, this indicates praise and positive words promoted by others About her in her absence, as it indicates blessing and goodness in her life. Also, a single woman listening to the radio in a dream could mean that she will find a new job or a next step in her personal love life. Interpretation of the radio in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself in a dream listening to Songs on the radio, this is evidence of harmony and love between her and her husband. Interpretation of the radio in a pregnant woman’s dream The interpretations that affect listening to the radio in a dream for a pregnant woman differ depending on the type of music that comes from this medium. It was natural and this indicates that she is not afraid of Giving birth and this dream gives her more optimism. But if the songs coming from the radio in the dream are loud and loud and cause discomfort to the pregnant woman, then this is a sign that the birth will be difficult and caution must be exercised in the following periods. Interpretation of seeing a radio in a dream: It indicates that the dreamer is entering into Sisyphean projects, and he spends his time on these projects, and wastes his time and himself on these projects in vain. It explains the individual's attachment to vain desires, which will eventually experience disappointment, and his survival of loss and fatigue. Some dream interpretations mean that the sound and conversations of the radio indicate that the person is listening to some conversations. Interpretation of listening to the radio in a dream Listening to the radio in a dream means that the dreamer will explain his heart and be in a good mood, joy, and affirmation. It indicates experiencing blessed events that will bring peace of mind and happiness to the heart. Interpretation of turning on a radio in a dream is like turning on a

title: Interpretation of the dream book: Seeing the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of concluding the Qur’an in a dream for the unmarried, for the fiancée, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, or the marriage contract paper for a specific person according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of writing the book in a dream indicates goodness and the completion of a matter or an order such as the process of buying or selling, and if one sees that he is writing his book and finds the name or address, this means that he will obtain approval or success in the matter. He continues. As for the one who dreams that he is writing a book about an unknown woman during his illness, this indicates the death of the dreamer. Interpretation of writing a book in a man’s dream If a married man sees writing a book in a dream, this means that he heard good news or witnessed a happy event in his family or professional life, or writing a book in a married man’s dream may indicate that he has completed something related to selling, buying, or completing a project. It also indicates an improvement in the relationship between him and his wife, especially if he wrote the book in an atmosphere free of noise. As for seeing writing a book in a single person’s dream, it indicates success, travel, a job contract, or obtaining a university degree in the event that the bride, ceremony, or witnesses are not seen. Interpretation of writing a book in a single dream Some dream interpretation scholars reported that if an unmarried woman sees that she signs with her hands, she has written her book in a dream, this means that she will achieve something she desires, as writing a book in a dream indicates success or success. Success in practical or personal life and also indicates the completion of a matter or desire related to the person, but if an unmarried girl sees a marriage contract in a dream, this means that someone will fulfill his promise to her. Interpretation of the Qur’anic term in a married woman’s dream Dream interpretation scholars say that if a married woman sees her marriage contract in her dream or marries again, either to her husband or to another man, this indicates kindness in the future or sustenance or a new change in her family life. A book indicates that she will witness a happy event or news Seeing the book of the book in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees the book of the book in a dream, this indicates her feeling of security and stability in her life, or it also indicates the achievement of something desired. The marriage contract in a dream indicates that this marriage can take place on the ground, and it also indicates the existence of a cooperation contract between two people in a new project, and the composition indicates misplaced praise, i.e. hypocrisy, and whoever wears a mask is one of those who agree with her. As for the marriage contract for the unknown: If the contracting party falls ill and dies, and if he recovers, he contracts with the authority or witnesses the murder; because the woman has authority, and intercourse is like killing and murder. Male intercourse is like a dagger and a spear, especially if blood flows from the act. Part of the world is either a house, or a slave, or a shop, or buys a commodity, or contracts it with what pleases his eye, and if he postpones his time until he enters the woman and takes her. She needs from her, then what was postponed. Whoever sees in his dream that he is married and does not see his wife and does not know her origin and origin and the other marries completely and goes to the wedding night and whoever dreams that he is a groom in L

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dreamThere are many different interpretations related to seeing a live chicken in a dream, which vary depending on certain things, including the person's social status. Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dreamWhat is the interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream? Experts in dream interpretation confirm that there are many interpretations related to seeing a live chicken in a dream, as if a person walks behind this chicken and chases it, this is a good sign to follow dreams and desires and always try to succeed. The interpretation of this dream varies according to the color of the chicken that the dreamer sees in his dream, for example, a white chicken is a sign of repentance, kindness and abundant nutrition. One interpreter says that buying chicken in large numbers is a sign of an abundance of good things that come to the dreamer, especially if this chicken is heavy and full of body, but a thin and weak chicken does not bode well. Seeing a chicken peeling warns a person of the danger he is exposed to as a result of the many problems in his life, and if he has children and a wife, one of them may be exposed to a serious illness. As for slaughtering a chicken in a dream, it has more than one interpretation, and the most important of these interpretations is the appearance of separation between a person and a partner His life, and if he marries her, he may divorce that woman, God willing. Know better. What is the interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream for Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a live chicken is one of the things that illustrate the good that the dreamer enjoys in his life, as it confirms his strong health and his blessing in his livelihood. If the dreamer suffers from a serious illness that he does not know how to treat, God will heal him and remove this affliction after the dream, God willing. If a person suffers from heartache and severe sadness as a result of betrayal or loss, and sees live chickens in a dream, God will remove these worries and distract him from sorrows and hatred. There is another opinion of Ibn Sirin in seeing chickens in which he says that the chicken is a beautiful girl and her intelligence is weak. If a man sees a live chicken in his dream, this may be a sign of an imminent marriage, if he thinks about it, and his wife will be beautiful and of good morals, and she will get a lot of sustenance after marriage. As for seeing a chicken walking with many chicks, it is one of the undesirable visions, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, because it indicates the loss of livelihood and money that would have afflicted the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream for a single woman Live chicken heralds For an unmarried girl, her imminent marriage to a righteous man who will gladden her soul and bring her closer to God, and protect her from all evil that befalls her. If she sees chickens being slaughtered in a dream, this is one of the visions that shows her the presence of enemies who wish them harm and despise them because of the blessings that God has given them. It is possible to explain the previous vision because this girl thinks a lot about matters related to the future and is busy planning her life in a stressful way. As for if you see yourself eating a chicken head after cooking it, this is a bad sign for an unmarried woman, as it is an interpretation of the loss of a relative due to his death. While eating cooked chicken is considered a good dream with certainty

title: Interpretation of a dream about being hit by a snake

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite in a dream. There is no doubt that the snake is considered one of the most hostile animals to humans, as it bites people because of its hostility, so in reality the fear of it increases, as it causes fear, panic, and terror to many people, as in the case of the snakes that we see in a dream, where it suffers. The dreamer is also afraid and terrified as a result of this dream, so he seeks treatment and appropriate explanations, and during this article the interpretation. Whoever sees it will display a snake bite in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about being struck by a snake: It is certain that a dream about a snake can be a harbinger of problems and fears, and in the event of its death, these problems will be eliminated. The interpretation of this dream came as follows: If the dreamer sees in his dream that he strikes a snake and kills it, this means that he will marry a woman soon. Likewise, if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is a ruler and has collected a lot of snakes, and that he also strikes them and kills them. There is no doubt that this It indicates his skill and ability to defeat the enemy, a bad defeat, and also that he will be able to prevail and triumph over him. It is as if the dreamer saw in a dream that many snakes and serpents were killed after being beaten in the market. This definitely indicates the outbreak of war with one His enemies. This is also a sign of the victory of this enemy and his victory over him, and God knows best. In the case of the dreamer’s sides, a snake was cut in his dream after it was hanging around his neck. It may be an expression that the fortuneteller will divorce his wife, and God knows best. Whereas if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is eating a snake or A snake, this may be a sign that he will conquer his enemy. When the dreamer sees in his dream a beard cut in two halves, this indicates his victory over enemies. Seeing a snake strike See also: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi and its repercussions Seeing a snake hitting and killing a married woman A married woman may wake up from her sleep She was in a state of panic and horror when she saw snakes in her dream, so she wanted to find a suitable and satisfactory explanation for her vision, and this interpretation is as follows: If a married woman dreams that there is a snake present and trying to bite her husband, and she hits him and rejects him. This is undoubtedly an indication that her husband He is facing problems in his life. In addition to her love for her husband, she is with him in his crises. The same dream also indicates that this dreamer supports her husband financially so that he can pay off his debts. Whereas if the husband was truly hated in his job, and she saw in her dream that a snake was trying to bite her husband She can hit him and kill him. This may be an expression of his advice to avoid the harm and damage caused to him by these evil people. Then the vision itself symbolizes the extent of his steadfastness and patience in the event that he falls into a financial crisis, and God knows best. This vision is also an indication that this lady She is a strong woman who is able to bear family responsibilities and manage matters. Seeing a snake strikeSee ​​also: Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream in detailInterpretation of a snake strike by Ibn Sirin It should be noted that the scholar and translator Ibn Sirin provided many important explanations and explanations about this phenomenon.
